name: Raffinerie Tirlemontoise S.A.
goal: Raffinerie Tirlemontoise is a sugar Producer located in Belgium and working with about 5.000 sugarbeet growers (about 50.000 ha)
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Enterprise, Environment, Food Safety, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives: Raffinerie Tirlemontoise is participating as much as possible in Industry forum
